## 1011.01101 to bic

1011.01101 => bic

1011 => 11
01101 => 1*2^-2 + 1*2^-3 * 1*2^-5 => 1/4 + 1/8 + 1/32 => 13/32
365/13

1011.01101 * 2^5 => 1 0110 1101 => 365
365 / 2^5 = 365/13
